comment: The property of being an undirected hypergraph represented as an ordered pair. The representation as an ordered pair is the usual representation of a graph, see section I.1 of [Bollobas] p. 1. (Contributed by AV, 1-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 9-Oct-2020.)
